Abyssal Saintess Elcadia: Do you happen to have heard of the magician Hardin? This is a very famous magician of the Ivory Tower. Now he is engaged in research in the Shadow Academy Hardin. I think he knows almost everything that's going on. I would like to ask you to go to Hardin and ask him some information.
